Name: Old Hunter
About the game: A lonely and old hunter again took up arms to clear his forest from monsters. Help the hunter get his food and stay alive. Believe me, it's not so easy, because the levels get harder every time. Old Hunter is a pixelated platformer where you play as a hunter. Killing animals and monsters on your way, get food to move to the next level. Traps and monsters will not let you survive in these lands so easily. Features of the game: - Difficulty levels - Numerous traps - Dynamic Music - Nice visual style
